doc.title: 10% actif
doc.plot: FLO and ARNO are trying to conceive for their first baby but all their attempts slowly turn into a real tug of war. Trailed around from analyses to medically-assisted fertilizations, the impeded couple slowly drowns into an unprecedented crisis when they discover a fecundity problem.

FLO and ARNO are trying to conceive for their first baby but all their attempts slowly turn into a real tug of war. Trailed around from analyses to medically-assisted fertilizations, the impeded couple slowly drowns into an unprecedented crisis when they discover a fecundity problem.
